caption:
Nutrition is vital for human health and development. Yet globally one in three people survive on diets that lack the essential vitamins and minerals needed to grow properly and live healthy lives.

Our Nutrient Gap Initiative aims to impact 50 million people in underserved communities by 2030, focusing on expanding access to essential vitamins, minerals, and diverse nutritious foods. In 2023, we reached over 30 million people. 

And our portfolio of innovative products and solutions empowers farmers to bring high-quality, nutritious foods to the table. 

#HealthForAll #HungerForNone
